paper_keywords: Bound on the magnitude of the derivative
paper_abstract: In this paper we present a new bound on the magnitude of the derivative of rational Bezier curve. Theoretical analysis shows that the new bound is better than many previous bounds. Numerical examples are also included to compare the new bound with some existed ones. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A new bound on the magnitude of the derivative of rational Bezier curve
